resources.string: Read phone state permission is needed to find out the information about the sim cards inserted in the device.
%s permission has been granted successfully. You can use the feature now without a hiccup.
Camera permission is needed to scan the recharge cards.
Call phone permission is needed to send the ussd request in background.
Read contacts permission is needed to find a phone number from your contact list.
Send sms permission is needed to send sms to activate/deactivate services.
It is used to toggle flash.
Sorry, flash is not available in your device
Tap the preview to focus on the pin!
Edit the pin in case if it is wrong
It is used to intercept the ussd response dialog to get the response text for sophisticated response display. It is absolutely safe to use.
No any sim cards detected. Please ensure that sim cards are inserted properly.
Refresh the balance now to retrieve your new balance!
Ussd request has failed to receive any response! Please try again some minutes later!

ABOUT BALANCE TRANSFER
  • You need to know your security code to transfer your balance.To find the security code, type \"scode\" and send sms to 1415.You should get security code in message reply shortly.
  • You can transfer balance from Rs. 10 up to Rs. 500 only per transfer.
  • You cannot transfer balance from one carrier network to another.
  • The service charge for the balance transfer is free in Namaste.
  • You can only transfer balance up to 20 times a day.
  • The validity date of receiving mobile is not increased with transfer.

ABOUT NAMASTE CREDIT
  • It is loan service provided by Namaste for it\'s GSM customers.
  • The debt is automatically cleared in the next recharge.
  • No extra charge is imposed on the credit.
  • The credit balance is activated automatically on the low balance to provide uninterruptible calling experience.
  • The amount of the credit allocated differs from one customer to another and is made on loyalty based assessment. It means the more you use the Namaste network, the more credit you are allocated.

ABOUT FRIENDS & FAMILY
  • It is a special service which allows you to make call to 5 different Namaste number in discounted price.
  • The voice tariff is 55 paisa/minute for GSM/CDMA post-paid and 70 paisa/minute for pre-paid subscriber.
  • The service can be enabled for free.

ABOUT MISSED CALL ALERT
  • This service provides you the information about the calls that you were unable to receive.
  • This service can be enabled free of cost and it is auto-renewed as well.
  • Upon successful subscription of the service, you will receive a SMS in the format: "You have a missed call from 984XXXXXXX(no.) at 2021-05-19 01:00:30" where no. represents the total call attempt.

ABOUT CALLER RING BACK TONE
  • This service replaces the boring standard ringback tone with hit songs and dialogues.
  • Send \"top\" to 1455 to get the top songs crbt code.
  • Caller tune subscription charge : Rs. 5 weekly and Rs. 20 monthly
  • Tone charge : Rs. 2.5 weekly and Rs. 10 monthly
Please enter recipient\'s 10 digits NTC phone number.
Please enter amount(in Rs.) between 10 and 500.
Enable 4G if you haven\'t already to enjoy faster data, better voice calls and many more.
Click the save button to save the security code for next use.

ABOUT BALANCE TRANSFER
  • You can transfer balance from Rs. 10 up to Rs. 200 only per transfer.
  • You cannot transfer balance from one carrier network to another.
  • The service charge for the balance transfer is Rs. 1(excluding taxes) in Ncell.
  • You can only transfer balance up to 3 times a day.
  • The validity date of receiving mobile is not increased with transfer.
Please enter recipient\'s 10 digits Ncell phone number.
Please enter amount(in Rs.) between 10 and 200.

ABOUT NCELL SAPATI
  • The main balance should be less than Rs. 5.
  • Charge : Loan amount(Rs. 40) + Rs. 2(exclusive of taxes)
  • The subscriber should have used the sim for more than 15 days.
  • Previous sapati(if taken) must be cleared.

ABOUT MY5 SERVICE
  • It allows you to make calls to 5 different Ncell numbers in discounted price.
  • Tariff : 99 paisa/min(Rs. 1.29/min with tax)
  • Charge : Rs. 25.54/month
  • For one month trial, dial 5588.

ABOUT MISSED CALL NOTIFICATION
  • There is no activation charge to enable this service.
  • You will receive SMS about the calls that you missed when you were outside the network coverage , enable flight mode or switch off the phone.

ABOUT PRBT SERVICE
  • It replaces the boring callback tone with your favourite music or tune.
  • PRBT service charge : Rs. 10 monthly
  • PRBT tone charge : Rs. 10 monthly

ABOUT LOW BALANCE CALL
  • It is a call service for user having or zero balance.
  • The balance will be deducted from the receiver\'s side.
  • The receiver is played a voice message and need to press 1 to accept the call.

ABOUT BALANCE TRANSFER
  • There is no limit in no. of times or the amount of balance transfer in SmartCell.
  • You cannot transfer balance from one carrier network to another.
  • The service charge for the balance transfer is free in SmartCell.
  • The validity date of receiving mobile is not increased with transfer.
Please enter recipient\'s 10 digits SmartCell phone number.

ABOUT SMARTCELL LOAN
  • The main balance should be equal to or less than Re. 1.
  • Service Charge : Rs. 2(exclusive of taxes)
  • The subscriber should have used the sim for more than 3 months.
  • Previous loan(if taken) must be cleared.

ABOUT MISSED CALL ALERTS
  • Service Charge : Rs. 6(exclusive of taxes)
  • You will receive SMS with the caller phone number and no. of times you missed the calls from the same number.

ABOUT CRBT SERVICE
  • It replaces the boring callback tone with your favourite music or tune.
  • Service charge : Rs. 12.77 monthly
  • Tone charge : Rs. 12.77 monthly
  • Both service and track will be auto renewed each month.
